meaning_str.bing:
n. 吉他
v. 弹吉他
网络. 吉它；吉他手；结他

1.en: An hour's drive to hear that crap. You know, it wasn't even a band. A guy with a guitar. An hour each way.
1.cn: 居然开一小时的车去听那种垃圾音乐，根本都算不上是乐队。一人抱一把吉他，每人一小时。

2.en: There was a time when he was able to sing, while playing his guitar.
2.cn: 曾有一段时间他能边弹吉他，边唱歌。

3.en: 'How much is that BC Rich? ' 'That's not a good guitar, sir, ' he replies. 'You don't want that. '
3.cn: “先生，那个吉他不怎么好”，他回答，“你不会想要那个的。”

0.en: Or you could just play your tiny, ridiculous guitar.
0.cn: 你就老老实实弹那把短小吉他吧。

1.en: But I wasn't stealing the guitar. Guitar? It was my great-great-grandfather's. He would have wanted me to have it.
1.cn: 但我不是要偷那把吉他。吉他？那是我曾曾祖父的，他肯定也想让我拿走的。

2.en: Give me your hands. Strings. Give me it. Pick. Do you want to learn to play guitar? Yes. Then don't touch one.
2.cn: 手给我，琴弦，这一只手，弹片，你想学吉他吗？想啊。那就不要碰吉他。

3.en: Have you still got your guitar? Of course. Let's Rockty Rock.
3.cn: 你现在还弹你的吉他吗？当然了！让我们一起来摇滚吧！

4.en: All right, my New Year's resolution is to learn how to play the guitar. Really? How come?
4.cn: 我的新年新希望是学吉他。真的？为什么？

5.en: Well, what am I gonna do? I really need my guitar. Yeah, I have stuff in there too.
5.cn: 我该怎么办？我需要我的吉他。我也有东西放在他家。

6.en: Yeah, listen so, I thought I was getting better, so on my way home today I stopped by this guitar store and…
6.cn: 我觉得我进步了，就在回家的路上去吉他店…

7.en: Think of something we might like to see you do. My talent is playing the guitar.
7.cn: 想想有什么事我们可能想看到你来做的事。我的才艺就是弹吉他。

8.en: He had a band. There was another thing he asked me to join his band. He plays guitar.
8.cn: 他有个乐队，还有件事是他邀请我加入他的乐队，他是吉他手。

9.en: And it was no coincidence that around that time I started getting good at the violin, the guitar and the drums.
9.cn: 并不是巧合，我那时开始玩小提琴，吉他，鼓，玩得越来越好。

10.en: You start changing the words to the prayers, next thing you know, you're in a church with a guitar.
10.cn: 一开始是乱改祷告词，很快你就会抱着吉他去教堂 把祷告词随便唱出来。

11.en: I got a scooter. I got a spaceship. A Little guitar. A toy mouse. A bat and ball. A skipping rope. A trumpet.
11.cn: 我有滑板车！我得到太空船了！小吉他！玩具老鼠！球连球拍！跳绳！喇叭！

12.en: I need to get my great-great-grandfather's blessing. You know where I can get a guitar? I know a guy.
12.cn: 但是我需要我曾曾祖父的祝福。你知道哪里可以搞到一把吉他吗？呃，我知道一个人。

13.en: The rocking Gazelles. Hello, Gigi. Have you still got your guitar? Of course. Let's Rockty Rock.
13.cn: 哦，这是摇滚羚羊啊！你好，吉吉。你现在还弹你的吉他吗？当然了！让我们一起来摇滚吧！

14.en: All in good time, my love. All in good time. Oh shoot. I left my guitar in their apartment. Well, you can let me in later, right?
14.cn: 你说的对，爱人，该死，我把吉他放在他们家，你待会能帮我开门吧？

15.en: There. No guitar. No music. Come. You'll feel better after you eat with your family. I don't wanna be in this family.
15.cn: 好了，没有吉他了，不再有音乐了，过来你跟家里人吃顿饭就全都好了。我才不想待在这样的家里呢。

16.en: But he also had a dream. To play for the world. And one day, he left with his guitar, and never returned.
16.cn: 但他有一个远大的梦想，他想让自己的音乐被整个世界听见，于是有一天他带着他的吉他，离开了家，从此再也没有回来。

17.en: What have you all asked Father Christmas for? A scooter. A toy spaceship. A Little guitar. A toy mouse. A skipping rope. A trumpet. A bat and ball.
17.cn: 你们跟圣诞老人要什么礼物呢？滑板车。玩具太空船。小吉他。玩具老鼠。跳绳。喇叭。球连球拍。

18.en: What have you all asked Father Christmas for? A scooter. A toy spaceship. A Little guitar. A toy mouse. A skipping rope. A trumpet. A bat and ball.
18.cn: 你们跟圣诞老人要什么礼物呢？滑板车。玩具太空船。小吉他。玩具老鼠。跳绳。喇叭。球连球拍。

19.en: I hope Mr. Zebra gave our letters to Father Christmas. I'm sure he did. Danny wanted a spaceship. Suzy, a scooter. Pedro, a guitar.
19.cn: 我希望斑马先生把我们的信都送到。我相信他一定会的。丹尼想要太空船。苏西想要滑板车。佩德罗想要吉他。
